title: We built the fastest CI and it failed
dot:
digraph EarthlyJourney{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_vision{label="Vision: Fastest CI";style="rounded";vision[label="No repeated builds
Automatic Parallelism
Reliable local reproduction", fillcolor="#ccf"];}subgraph cluster_milestones{label="Milestones";style="rounded";milestone1[label="1. Earthly (Build System)
Focus: Build Consistency
Result: Wide adoption", fillcolor="#aaf"];milestone2[label="2. Earthly Satellites
Focus: Build Speed (2-20x)
Result: Enthusiastic adoption
(even pre-release)", fillcolor="#aaf"];milestone3[label="3. Earthly CI (Platform)
Focus: Unified CI/CD
Result: Low adoption", fillcolor="#faa"];}vision->milestone1->milestone2->milestone3;subgraph cluster_challenges{label="Challenges";style="rounded,dashed";challenge1[label="Cost of Migration
(vs. unproven benefits)", fillcolor="#ffc"];challenge2[label="Existing Satellite users
already get 95% of value", fillcolor="#ffc"];challenge3[label="Earthly users wanted
consistency, not speed", fillcolor="#ffc"];challenge4[label=""CI" label created stigma
(A/B test revealed)", fillcolor="#ffc"];}milestone3->challenge1;milestone3->challenge2;milestone3->challenge3;milestone3->challenge4;subgraph cluster_future{label="Future: Focus on Core Strengths";style="rounded";future1[label="Shutdown Earthly CI
(Oct 1, 2023)", fillcolor="#ccf"];future2[label="Double down on Earthly & Satellites", fillcolor="#ccf"];future3[label="New Features:
Satellite Metrics
Build History
Auto-skip
Remote Docker Builds
Self-hosted Satellites
Distributed Satellites", fillcolor="#ccf"];}challenge1->future1;challenge2->future1;challenge3->future1;challenge4->future2;future2->future3;}

(Official)", style=filled, fillcolor="#d3e0f5"];"Content Farms"[label="Content Farms
(e.g., GeeksforGeeks, W3Schools)", style=filled, fillcolor="#f5d3d3"];"User Preference"[label="User Preference", shape=diamond, style=filled, fillcolor="#f0e68c"];"Quality vs. Speed"[label="Quality vs. Speed", shape=diamond, style=filled, fillcolor="#e6f5d3"];"SEO Practices"[label="SEO Practices", shape=diamond, style=filled, fillcolor="#f5d3f0"];"Google Search"->"Python Documentation"[label="Ranked Low"];"Google Search"->"Content Farms"[label="Ranked High"];"Content Farms"->"User Preference"[label="Quick Examples
